name: obsidian-related-notes
description: An Obsidian plugin that suggests related notes using bloom filter similarity

scripts.build:vault: tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production && node -e "const homedir = process.env.HOME || process.env.USERPROFILE; const targetDir = homedir + '/Desktop/ObsidianVault/.obsidian/plugins/related-notes'; require('fs').mkdirSync(targetDir, {recursive: true}); require('fs').copyFileSync('main.js', targetDir + '/main.js'); require('fs').copyFileSync('styles.css', targetDir + '/styles.css'); require('fs').copyFileSync('manifest.json', targetDir + '/manifest.json'); console.log('Files copied to ' + targetDir);"
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: Oluwasanya Awe
